# [Interview #1108: WOR-Omaha, NE, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1108#9)

#### Macen

What group, if any, was Shallan's mother a part of?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO. But you are right, she was indeed involved.
